attributes.additional_details: I am tired of being subject to a barrage of deafening fireworks nearly every night from now until the New Year along with the fear they install in my pets  Fireworks sound more like mortar bombs these days and I would like to see them banned from public use with organised displays only.  I am sick of jumping out of my skin and running in all directions to comfort my pets; the noise is intolerable and in my opinion an invasion of my quality of life.  Existing restrictions are as useful as a chocolate teapot
